name: Dark Hearth
description:
Introduction

A boss-only arena game where you must defeat every boss to save a once colorful world from going dark forever, The castle you find yourself fighting through is was named The Dark Hearth due to its constant night that covers the region around it.

Unfortunately that darkness is spreading through the world and no one has been able to stop it.

Black & White Game Jam Release

This version was made in under 2 weeks for the Black & White game jam!

I hope to revisit this in the future for a full game.
